title: Worlds RP scam
body: So my one trusted friend sent me a the link for the worlds rp scam, I went to the site from a link in the client and when it asked me for just my username and region I put it in without really thinking. I quickly realized it was a scam and didn't go any further. I changed my password just to be sure but am I at risk just by going to the site and only entering my username and region? and would going to the link from the client affect the information they get at all? I was told that as long as i didn't enter any info in a survey I would be fine. I just want to know if my account is at risk just by visiting the site from the client and by entering only my username and region. Thanks

replies.body: You should be fine as long as you didn't enter in all of your information. I'm not currently seeing any signs of hackers, but if you want to make doubly sure that your account is safe you can reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
So I entered my username and regoin and I’m slightly panicking after being told what it is what’s should I do? Pls help !
